lead_paragraph: RIEGELHAUPT--Richard. Age 88, died June 21, 2016. Predeceased by beloved wife, Doris. Survived by his devoted daughter, Dr. Rona Riegelhaupt (Montag), son-in-law Steven, granddaughters Danielle and Carly. Retired as Civil Engineer for the NYC Dept of City Planning. Graduate of Stuyvesant High School, CCNY and Brooklyn Polytechnic. Avid Mets fan known as "Dick from Queens" on WFAN, master joke teller, loved travel, classical music and politics. Devoted to his family. Always in our hearts. 1/3
